meanings.definition: The process or result of oxidizing.
meanings.sent1: The oxidations in the lab were carefully monitored.
meanings.sent2: I learned about different types of oxidations in my chemistry class.
meanings.sent3: The oxidations in the experiment turned the liquid a surprising color.
meanings.sent4: Her love for baking was like the oxidations in a chemical reaction, transforming ingredients into something new.
meanings.sent5: The oxidations in nature can be seen in the rusting of metal over time.

meanings.definition: The act or process of oxidizing.
meanings.sent1: We observed the oxidations happening in the test tube.
meanings.sent2: The oxidations of the metal caused it to corrode.
meanings.sent3: The oxidations in the kitchen resulted in a burnt dinner.
meanings.sent4: The oxidations of time slowly changed the appearance of the statue.
meanings.sent5: The oxidations of the fire turned the wood into ashes.
